stages.description: You're #1! You prepare to crush your enemy with the power of your expertly trained pocket monsters.
You prepare to hurl your capture sphere at your enemy, unleashing a devastating adversary!
It's always a good time when you get to duel. Time to show this wannabe that you're the best!
You wind up a throw with your capture sphere. Your opponent doesn't know what they're in for!
You grin broadly as you wind up a throw, preparing to show off your impressive skills.
The attack destroys your ablative crop top. Irritating, but it serves its purpose of buying you time.
The attack grazes off your shirt, destroying it but leaving you unharmed. You prepare to counterattack.
The attack shreds your shirt, but you're not impressed--it was cheap anyway. You prepare to continue the fight.
Your shirt is destroyed by the attack--unimpressive. You wind up for a counterattack.
All of your opponent's efforts were only enough to tear off your clothes. You prepare to show off your true power!
The attack destroys your shorts as well! With no protective clothing left, you prepare to battle on in your swimsuit.
How irritating--your shorts are gone too. You're able to keep going in your swimsuit, though.
The attack destroys the last of your ablative clothing. You'd better win quickly if you don't want to end up transformed.
Your shorts are disintegrated too, but you've still got a few tricks left. You prepare a counterattack of your own.
You try to get away, but the attack strikes you anyway, removing the last of your clothes. You're vulnerable now!
You wind up an throw, but before you can release, an attack strikes, turning the bottom half of your exposed body to silver!
A quick attack catches you mid-throw. With no defenses left, it quickly begins turning you to silver!
You prepare a quick throw, but your opponent is quicker. Before you can let loose, your body is mostly transformed to silver.
As you prepare your capture sphere, a powerful attack strikes home. If you don't win soon, you'll be just a statue!
You prepare your next move, but a quick attack catches you off guard and leaves you almost entirely transformed to silver. This is your last chance.
You lose! You are now just a solid silver statue, posed holding your capture sphere in your hands.
You try to escape, but the transformation overwhelms you. Your capture sphere drops out of your motionless silver hand.
With all of your defenses worn away, the transformation quickly takes your body. You stand motionless, turned to precious silver.
You yelp in shock as the final attack strikes you, sealing your fate. Your capture sphere drops from your hands as your helpless body swiftly turns to silver.
You prepare to unleash a final attack--but the transformation finishes you off before you can act. You are just a silver statue, helplessly caught midmotion.
